messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning]  Gun slinging Libertarians
messages.msgSnippet: I m a Green. Elissa, who will soon be singing Yippee - Kai - Yay! ... From: ddzimlew@juno.com  To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
I'm a Green.

Elissa, who will soon be singing
Yippee - Kai - Yay!
-----Original Message-----
From: ddzimlew@... <ddzimlew@...>
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com <AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com>
Date: Monday, February 04, 2002 11:13 PM
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Gun slinging Libertarians


>
>
>On Mon, 04 Feb 2002 14:29:53 -0800 Pam Hartley
><pamhartley@...> writes:
>
>> My husband is a
>> conservative
>> Republican, I'm a Libertarian, like to think of myself as moderate,
>> and
>> often vote Republican.
>
>I think my son is going to be a Libertarian. He loved watching Harry
>Browne during the last election and he always watches Politically
>Incorrect. He has a lot of Libertarian philosophies. I think
>unschooling and Libertarianism is a perfect fit.
>
>He's also just asked his dad if he can go target shooting with him next
>time.
>I'm not freaking. I'm not freaking. I'm not freaking.
>
>Deb L

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning]  Gun slinging Libertarians
messages.msgSnippet: On Mon, 04 Feb 2002 14:29:53 -0800 Pam Hartley ... I think my son is going to be a Libertarian.  He loved watching Harry Browne during the last election and he
messages.messageBody:
On Mon, 04 Feb 2002 14:29:53 -0800 Pam Hartley
<pamhartley@...> writes:

> My husband is a
> conservative
> Republican, I'm a Libertarian, like to think of myself as moderate,
> and
> often vote Republican.

I think my son is going to be a Libertarian. He loved watching Harry
Browne during the last election and he always watches Politically
Incorrect. He has a lot of Libertarian philosophies. I think
unschooling and Libertarianism is a perfect fit.

He's also just asked his dad if he can go target shooting with him next
time.
I'm not freaking. I'm not freaking. I'm not freaking.

Deb L
